purge is kind of uninstalling I guess.
command

is that real he always repead it . is it joke or sth?
that is a bot
so should i do what he says dpkg -l | awk '/^rc/{print $2}' |  sudo xargs dpkg -P

it is in the ubuntu repos and is (imho) superior to the commercial options
